info.name: Slack Teams
info.description:
Some CSS to make Microsoft Teams a little more like Slack.

This version is based HEAVILY on the existing work mstmstyle did for his "Condensed Microsoft Teams for Light theme", in fact I flat out copied, pasted, and modified it.

mstmstyle says this is fine :)
This style was created to make up for the issue complained about here: https://microsoftteams.uservoice.com/forums/555103-public/suggestions/17408641-please-create-a-professional-compact-chat-layout (from 2016)
This issue has been migrated to the new feedback portal, here's the new link! https://feedbackportal.microsoft.com/feedback/idea/d556e0f6-262e-ec11-b6e6-00224827bbc2

Please visit that link, vote it up, and hope MS fixes Teams :)

I use Teams every day, but I don't use every feature of teams; so if you see any bugs or have any suggestions for changes, please send me your comments.  Thanks!
info.additionalInfo:
12/14/2021 - Whew, harsh Ananya, but true!  Unfortunately it's actually just Teams spacing showing through.  The screenshot was an actual screenshot at one time, but Teams styles change and I try to keep up.  Looks like M$ is obfuscating the CSS now and randomizing the CSS classes to frustrate style sheet customizations like this.  It's irritating, but I guess they're bound an determined to keep all that empty whitespace in the chat screen.  I did find a way around their obfuscation, for now, and updated the biggest holes in the styling, and also made some other adjustments.

5/24/2021 - adjusted styles for the call keypad, fixed an issue with some hard-to-read text colors in the call tab

5/18/2021 - got rid of more whitespace to the right of the chat area, fixed an issue with some hard-to-read text colors

5/6/2021 - moved the user status indicator back up into the avatar picture, removing extra space around images in chats

3/9/2021 - Fixed some long-overdue problems with colors in the left bar.  Also, updated for some of the latest Teams changes

12/5/2019 - Fixed some issues with long lines in a chat not being visible, and updated to make reactions to messages in a chat more visible

12/2/2019 - Adjusted chat window width to compensate for stylesheet changes from MS and @Mention popup coloring fix

8/21/2019 - Fixed color and highlighting on the personal profile settings pop-up, recipient pop-up, and message text formatting pop-up

8/20/2019 - Fixed color and highlighting to sidebar sub-menu and for the "attach file" sub-menu, also reversed the additional info and updates messages ordering for this section - newest first

Fixing the "Reactions" pop-up

Hiding the "reply" link at the bottom of every message seemed like a neat idea, but it was too buggy and hard to "catch" the reply link sometimes.  disabling for now, maybe it'll come back later

Updated to compensate for some recent Teams styling changes

Made the channel list a little wider to accommodate longer team names

Updated the user info popup, emoji search box, stickers popup, and webhook/bot info to have readable colors

Updated colors on the other left sidebars (Chat, Activity, Files)

Now with fixes for some spacing issues, including the like button (and other related buttons) and threading

Updated to work with the different themes

Channels bar has been condensed and colored closer to slack - it looks MUCH nicer :)

Also updated the message bar to have a slack-style border and white background

Also reduced the size of the  "cards" from webhooks
